original: Kristenson, Bengt Roland, konstnär, Göteborg, f. 21/7/20 i Gbg av Martin K. o. Signe Swensson. — Stud :ex. i Gbg 40, stud. v. Gbgs högsk. 41-42, v. Valand under Nils Nilsson 42-45. Utställt teckn. i Sthlm o. Gbg, delt. i saml :utställn. i Danm. Repr. i Nat:-mus., Gbgs konstmus., Borås mus., FL K. H. Kronprinsens ;saml. Leander-Engström-stip. 45.
translated: Kristenson, Bengt Roland, artist, Gothenburg, b. 21/7/20 in Gothenburg to Martin K. and Signe Swensson. — Studies: examination in Gothenburg in 1940, student at Gothenburg University in 1941-1942, at Valand under Nils Nilsson in 1942-1945. Exhibited drawings in Stockholm and Gothenburg, participated in collective exhibitions in Denmark. Represented in the National Museum, Gothenburg Art Museum, Borås Museum, FL K. H. Crown Prince's collection. Awarded the Leander-Engström stipend in 1945.

collections.name: FL K. H. Crown Prince's collection
